basics.name: Luis Alejandro Anaya Marin
basics.label: Full Stack Web Developer (5+ Years Experience)
basics.summary: Specializing in full-stack development and modern web solutions, I build high-performance applications using Next.js, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, Sanity CMS, and PostgreSQL. Proficient in React Server Components, technical SEO optimization, and scalable architectures, consistently achieving 90+ Lighthouse scores. With five years of experience across in-house, freelance, and external consultancy roles, I've delivered e-commerce platforms, SaaS dashboards, and CMS-driven websites, focusing on maintainability and exceptional user experience.

work.name: Full Stack Consulting
work.summary: Led legacy code modernization, UI/UX overhaul, and end-to-end development of web applications. Developed custom solutions focusing on maintainability, security, and performance. Conducted SEO audits and implemented optimizations, achieving Lighthouse scores over 95 and a 30% improvement in Google search rankings.

work.name: LAAM.DEV
work.summary: Built high-performance websites, including landing pages, applications, and e-commerce stores. Developed decoupled APIs for seamless content delivery across platforms. Executed comprehensive strategies to improve visibility and engagement. Leveraged modern tech stack to deliver cutting-edge solutions, achieving 30% average increase in organic traffic.

work.name: Bukitt
work.summary: Delivered luxury travel agency's website with end-to-end design and development. Implemented user-friendly CMS for non-technical staff. Launched specialized website for Camino de Santiago pilgrimages. Executed branding and content strategy, achieving top Google ranking.
